amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the recommendation contained in the resolution from censure to reprimand.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to change the recommendation of censure contained in the resoluttion to that of reprimand.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A001) and on the resolution.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Butterfield amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 146 - 267 (Roll no. 606).
